control_classes

Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • control_classes.AI

  • public class AI
extends java.lang.Object
    AI class has two methods that contain the movement specified for the level of difficult of the AI needed Created by Jilada on 26/03/17.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AI(IOHandle handle, GameSetUp gameFace)
      Constructor for the AI class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void moveAI()
      moveAI is a function that that simply moved the AI side to side The AI is not imtelligent and is used in the esay mode for the players
      void moveAIAdvanced()
      moveAIAdvanced is a function that moves all available AIs in an intelligent way to an extent If it cannot detect the ball the (goes out of the line of sight) it will simply move like the unintelligent AI

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • moveAI

        public void moveAI()
        moveAI is a function that that simply moved the AI side to side The AI is not imtelligent and is used in the esay mode for the players

      • moveAIAdvanced

        public void moveAIAdvanced()
        moveAIAdvanced is a function that moves all available AIs in an intelligent way to an extent If it cannot detect the ball the (goes out of the line of sight) it will simply move like the unintelligent AI
